alert.note: Alert for Bolivar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 02 at 10:24PM CST until January 02 at 11:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bolivar County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 1115 PM CST. * At 1024 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Trusten Holder WMA, or 10 miles east of Pea Ridge, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Gunnison around 1035 PM CST. Deeson around 1045 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Alligator, Winstonville, Duncan and Merigold. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CST for northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
